thread.title: 'Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice' New Images Arrive
thread.title_full: 'Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice' New Images Arrive

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice' New Images Arrive
text:
Comments The four new images feature the Caped Crusader, the Man of Steel and Wonder Woman showing off their efforts to bring back peace. 
Some new images of " Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice " have arrived. Debuted in the new issue of Total Film magazine, the four images feature the titular superheroes and Wonder Woman. Two of the images look much the same with some particular scenes in previous trailers. The first one shows Gal Gadot 's Wonder Woman wielding her shield and the second one features Henry Cavill 's Superman and Ben Affleck 's Batman facing each other in a showdown. There are also two behind-the-scenes images that capture the Man of Steel surrounded by people in costumes and the Caped Crusader defeating a thug. The three DC superheroes are also featured on the cover of the magazine along with quote from Cavill. "It's epic - This is comic-book history," so reads Cavill's quote. Cavill also uploaded the image of the magazine cover on his Facebook page. "So I've finally taken the leap into social media! And here's a little treat for you all in the form of a sneak peak of the Batman v Superman cover shot from Total Film magazine, before the issue comes out on Friday," he captioned the photo. 
So I’ve finally taken the leap into social media! And here’s a little treat for you all in the form of a sneak peak of... Posted by Henry Cavill on Wednesday, 21 October 2015 As Batman and Superman are at war with one another in the upcoming film, a new threat quickly arises, putting mankind in greater danger than it's ever known before. "Dawn of Justice" also stars Jesse Eisenberg as Lex Luthor, Jeremy Irons as Alfred and Jason Momoa as Aquaman. Zack Snyder serves behind the lens with the script he wrote alongside Chris Terrio and David S. Goyer. Produced by Charles Roven and Deborah Snyder, the upcoming superhero movie is slated for a release in the U.S. on March 25, 2016.
